name: botui-faq-chatbot
description: A WordPress plugin that uses BotUI to display a chatbot interface for FAQs

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dir=path.join(__dirname,'public','dist');if(fs.existsSync(dir)){fs.rmSync(dir,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('Cleaned dist directory');}else{console.log('Dist directory does not exist.')}"

author: WordPress Developer
